UserSongVotes.SongID: Song that the user voted on
UserSongVotes.VoteScore: Not sure how to calculate yet (0% to 100%)
UserSongVotes.UpPointsCast: Number of up points in user's vote
UserSongVotes.DownPointsCast: Number of down points in user's vote
UserSongVotes.TotalPoints: Sum of up points and down points
UserSongVotes.Public: Should the vote be displayed in user profile?

FantasyLabel.LabelName: Unique user label name (one per user)
FantasyLabel.UserFantasyPoints: Number of points acquired through signed artists

SignedArtists.Lineup1: First artist signed (user receives 100% of points)
SignedArtists.Lineup2: Second artist signed (user receives 80% of points)
SignedArtists.Lineup3: Third artist signed (user receives 60% of points)
SignedArtists.Lineup4: Fourth artist signed (user receives 40% of points)
SignedArtists.Lineup5: Fith artist signed (user receives 20% of points)

Artist.ArtistID: ArtistID# indicating order added to database

Points.OriginalPoints: Points earned from an artist's original songs
Points.FeaturedPoints: Points earned from features on other artist's songs
Points.FeaturePoints: Points earned by featured artists on their songs (50% of points earned by artists featured on their songs)
Points.ArtistUpPoints: Total number of up points earned
Points.ArtistDownPoints: Total number of down points received
Points.TotalPoints: Difference between up points and down points

ArtistSongs.SongScore: Not sure how to calculate yet... (between 0% and 100%)
ArtistSongs.Album: Title of album the song is on
ArtistSongs.SongTotalPoints: Sum of up and down points

Words.WordID: Unique identifier for every word in song's lyrics (UserID.ArtistID.SongName.SpanID.DateCreated)
Words.WordUpPoints: Total up points for word in song
Words.WordDownPoints: Total down points for word in song
Words.WordTotalPoints: Difference between word's up and down points
Words.WordColor: Color between green and red determined by word's total score (0% = full green, 50% = White, 100% = full red)

ArtistSongs.FeatureSongs: SongIDs that artist is featured on
